T02D1771:267b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la s'a dha nam /
T02D1771:267b-3: dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1771:267b-4: rdo rje nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1771:267b-5: sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i ngang las /
T02D1771:267b-6: sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la h'um yig nag
T02D1771:267b-7: po de nyid las yongs su rdzogs pa'i rje btsun
T02D1771:267b-8: dpal nag po chen po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D1771:267b-9: sku mdog nag po spyan gsum pa 'bar ba chen
T02D1771:267b-10: po phyag g-yas pa gri gug g-yon gyis thod pa
T02D1771:267b-12: skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1771:267b-14: mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par byed pa /
T02D1771:267b-15: yan lag thams cad la sbrul gyis brgyan pa bong thung ba /
T02D1771:267b-16: zhal nas khrag 'dzags par bdag nyid skad cig tu rdzogs par byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1771:267b-17: de la sngags ni 'di lta ste /
T02D1771:267b-18: aom ma h'a k'a la h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1771:267b-19: dug dang khrag dang sgog pa yungs kar rnams kyi spos phul nas /
T02D1771:267b-20: sha dang sran chen myos byed dang //
T02D1771:267b-21: me tog bdug spos byug pa dang //
T02D1771:267b-22: sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga //
T02D1771:267b-23: nag po chen po'i gtor ma bya //
T02D1771:267b-24: de yi sngags ni 'di lta ste //
T02D1771:267b-25: aom ma h'a k'a la ya sh'a sa no pa
T02D1771:267b-26: ka ra y'a sarya mushta shma sh'a na b'a si
T02D1771:267b-27: n'a skri t'a ya ae sho aa pashtsi ma k'a
T02D1771:267b-28: lonyayam ya ti t'am pra tidzny'a sma ra si ti
T02D1771:267b-29: d'a ai mam ratna tra y'a ka ri na m'a
T02D1771:267b-30: mu ka na dusht'am kha kh'a hi kha kh'a hi
T02D1771:267b-38: m'a ra ya h'um h'um phat phat /
T02D1771:267b-39: sarba yaksha r'a ksha sa bh'u ta pre ta pri sh'a tsa na /
T02D1771:267b-40: ba la gri hna m'a ma siddhi ku ru sh'antim
T02D1771:267b-41: ku ru raksha ku ru zhes bya ba gtor ma'i
T02D1771:268a-1: de la nye bar spyod pa 'di yin te /
T02D1771:268a-2: ku sha las bsgral bya'i gzugs brnyan la /
T02D1771:268a-3: tsha ba gsum dang dug dang ske tshe ma rnams
T02D1771:268a-4: ra tsi ka cho ga bzhin du bskus nas rtsang
T02D1771:268a-5: gis khrag tham par btsugs te gang gi ming gis
T02D1771:268a-6: me la bdugs na de ni skad cig de nyid
T02D1771:268a-7: la mi snang ba dang nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1771:268a-9: gang zhig slob dpon la sdang dang //
T02D1771:268a-10: rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la smod //
T02D1771:268a-11: sems can du ma 'joms byed pa //
T02D1771:268a-12: nag po chen pos gsol bar mdzad //
T02D1771:268a-13: de bzhin mgo la 'dug nas su //
T02D1771:268a-14: til 'bru tsam du gtub par byed //
T02D1771:268a-15: ces bya ba la sogs pa dpag tu med pa rtogs par bya'o //
